H0.text: Who was the first leader of the Russian Federation . Mikhail Gorbachev

H1.text: Who was the first leader of the Russian Federation . Alexander Rutskoy

H2.text: Who was the first leader of the Russian Federation . Nikolai Ryzhkov

H3.text: Who was the first leader of the Russian Federation . Yelcin

A4.text: he was elected president of the Russian Soviet Federative Socialist Republic (RSFSR), becoming the first popularly-elected head of state in Russian history.

A5.text: With the dissolution of the Soviet Union, the RSFSR became the Russian Federation, an independent state. Through that transition, Yeltsin remained in office as president.
